articles.title: Hozah has been awarded PayTech Company of the Year
articles.text: This award is a testament to our unwavering commitment to driving innovation in payment technology. We are redefining the parking experience, making the journey effortless through cutting-edge technology.

services.title: A Single Ecosystem. Total Control
services.text: By integrating smart payments, compliance, real-time data, and asset optimisation, Hozah removes complexity, streamlines operations, and unlocks untapped revenue-helping commercial landowners and asset managers maximise the value of their parking portfolio.

cases.title: Driving Revenue Growth at Westfield London
cases.text: Increased annual revenue by 15% through higher parking fees and improved occupancy rates. Achieved a 20% increase in average spend per visit by encouraging longer stays.

testimonials.title: Increased revenue
testimonials.text: Hozah’s digital-first approach transformed our car park, increasing revenue by 20% while improving compliance and customer satisfaction.
testimonials.name: Julie Webb

careers.title: Backend Developer
careers.text: We are looking for a software engineer who is eager to learn about new technologies with a desire for continuous improvement. You should care first and foremost about understanding the business impact of the work you do.
